T1046.name: Network Service Scanning
T1046.description: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of services running on remote hosts

T1110.name: Brute Force
T1110.description: Adversaries may use brute force techniques to gain access to accounts
T1110.detection: Monitor authentication logs for failed attempts

T1110.001.name: Brute Force: Password Guessing
T1110.001.description: Adversaries may use password guessing to gain access

T1190.name: Exploit Public-Facing Application
T1190.description: Adversaries may attempt to exploit weaknesses in web applications

T1059.name: Command and Scripting Interpreter
T1059.description: Adversaries may abuse command interpreters to execute commands

T1071.name: Application Layer Protocol
T1071.description: Adversaries may communicate using application layer protocols

T1005.name: Data from Local System
T1005.description: Adversaries may search local system sources to find files of interest
